title: 2013–14 TFF First League
text:
The 2013–14 <a href="TFF%20First%20League">TFF First League</a>, also known as "PTT First League") due to sponsoring reasons (in <a href="Turkish%20language">Turkish</a>: "PTT 1. Lig", is the 13th season since the league was established in 2001 and 51st season of the second-level <a href="Association%20football">football</a> league of <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a> since its establishment in 1963–64.
Teams.
<a href="Orduspor">Orduspor</a>, <a href="Mersin%20%C4%B0dman%20Yurdu">Mersin İdman Yurdu</a> and <a href="%C4%B0stanbul%20B.B.">İstanbul B.B.</a> relegated from <a href="S%C3%BCper%20Lig">Süper Lig</a>. <a href="Kayseri%20Erciyesspor">Kayseri Erciyesspor</a>, <a href="%C3%87aykur%20Rizespor">Çaykur Rizespor</a> and <a href="Konyaspor">Konyaspor</a> promoted to <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20S%C3%BCper%20Lig">2013–14 Süper Lig</a>.
<a href="Kahramanmara%C5%9Fspor">Kahramanmaraşspor</a>, <a href="Bal%C4%B1kesirspor">Balıkesirspor</a> and <a href="Fethiyespor">Fethiyespor</a> promoted from <a href="TFF%20Second%20League">TFF Second League</a>. <a href="G%C3%B6ztepe%20A.%C5%9E.">Göztepe</a>, <a href="Kartalspor">Kartalspor</a> and <a href="MKE%20Ankarag%C3%BCc%C3%BC">Ankaragücü</a> relegated to <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20TFF%20Second%20League">2013–14 TFF Second League</a>.
League table.
